General.Name: Talant Optronics (Suzhou) Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Talant Optronics (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the research and development, production, and sale of photoelectric light guide plates and related components in China and internationally. The company's products portfolio comprises photoelectric light guide plates for tablets, displays, and notebooks; vehicle control light guides; lighting light guides; and TV light guides. Talant Optronics (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
